entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
